frontmatter.description: A great deal of press attention for the new iPad seems to centre around rumours of the next version - apparently a bigger leap forward.
frontmatter.title: The New iPad

frontmatter.description: Once again a little bit of tech support to fill a gap in the Google results...
frontmatter.title: Microsoft Remote Desktop Client on Mac OS X: "Cannot verify the identity of the computer that you want to connect to"

frontmatter.description: Recently the new version of Mac OS X, Lion, was released to the public. This version features a new recovery partition which cannot be setup if you have multiple HFS partitions as described in this tutorial. I will look into this in August, but for now, be cautious if you want to upgrade to Lion.
frontmatter.title: Installing Windows on a Mac with Multiple Partitions
